plot: Michele Burton has the knack for making people understand what they really want to get out of life. In the pilot for the proposed sitcom, Michele helps a young intern realize he really wants to pursue a career outside of medicine.
title: The Michele Lee Show
plot_es: Michele Burton has the knack for making people understand what they really want to get out of life. In the pilot for the proposed sitcom, Michele helps a young intern realize he really wants to pursue a career outside of medicine.
plot_en: Michele Burton has the knack for making people understand what they really want to get out of life. In the pilot for the proposed sitcom, Michele helps a young intern realize he really wants to pursue a career outside of medicine.
